LanguageData.MakeMiningHelmet.label: 制造 mining helmet
LanguageData.MakeMiningHelmet.description: Crafts a mining helmet. Has a built in light and increases mining speed. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.MakeCPS.label: Fabricate chemical protection suit
LanguageData.MakeCPS.description: A chemical protection suit (also known as a hazmat suit) can protect people from hazardous materials or substances including chemicals, biological agents or radioactive materials. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.MakeCPS.jobString: 制造 a Chemical Protection Suit.
LanguageData.MakeCPH.label: Fabricate chemical protection helmet
LanguageData.MakeCPH.description: A part of the chemical protection suit (also known as a hazmat suit). Protects people from hazardous materials or substances including chemicals, biological agents or radioactive materials. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.MakeCPH.jobString: 制造 a Chemical Protection Helmet.
LanguageData.BuildTFJ_Tool_Woodcutting_Handaxe.label: Smith handaxe
LanguageData.BuildTFJ_Tool_Woodcutting_Handaxe.descri: Smiths a handaxe. Equip it to increase plant working speed. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.BuildTFJ_Tool_Building_Hammer.label: Smith hammer
LanguageData.BuildTFJ_Tool_Building_Hammer.descriptio: Smiths a hammer. Equip it to increase construction speed. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.BuildTFJ_Tool_Mining_Pickaxe.label: Smith pickaxe
LanguageData.BuildTFJ_Tool_Mining_Pickaxe.description: Smiths a pickaxe. Equip it to increase mining speed. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.MakePsychicInsanityLance.label: Assemble psychic insanity lance
LanguageData.MakePsychicInsanityLance.description: Assemble a psychic insanity lance that drives any character into a berserk state from any distance and through any nearby walls. Very powerful weapon. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.MakePsychicShockLance.label: Assemble psychic shock lance
LanguageData.MakePsychicShockLance.description: One-use artifact that directs psychic disturbances towards one character, dropping them into a state of psychic shock for some time. Large risk of brain damage. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.MakePsychicAnimalPulser.label: Assemble psychic animal pulser
LanguageData.MakePsychicAnimalPulser.description: One-use artifact that drives all animals in the region into a manhunting rage. \n\n产出：1.
LanguageData.MakePsychicSoothePulser.label: Assemble psychic soothe pulser
LanguageData.MakePsychicSoothePulser.description: One-use artifact which gives a temporary mood boost to everyone on the map. \n\n产出：1.
